keyMoments.title: T Bone's Debut
keyMoments.description: Marine Captain T Bone makes his first appearance aboard the Puffing Tom. Known as 'Ship Cutter,' he hears the commotion from Sanji's battle and prepares to investigate by drawing his sword.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a notable Marine officer who will confront the Straw Hats. Establishes T Bone as an honorable and skilled swordsman.

abilities.description: A unique swordsmanship style that generates angular slashes. T Bone wields a sword called Bamboo with a perfectly straight blade.

reveals.information: Known as 'Ship Cutter' for his ability to cut large ships in half
Marine Captain aboard the Puffing Tom
Prior to joining the Marines, he was a royal knight

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Determination to Save Robin
keyMoments.description: Despite the dangerous Aqua Laguna storm and the impossibility of sailing, Luffy declares his unwavering determination to rescue Robin from CP9, inspiring others to help provide the Rocketman.
keyMoments.significance: Reaffirms Luffy's commitment to his crewmates and galvanizes the rescue mission that will define the Enies Lobby arc.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to save Robin no matter what!

keyMoments.title: Accepting the Franky Family
keyMoments.description: When the Franky Family begs to join the rescue mission, Luffy immediately accepts their help, allowing them to join despite Nami's opposition.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's leadership style of accepting anyone who shares his goals, expanding the rescue force.

keyMoments.title: Lending the Rocketman
keyMoments.description: Kokoro leads the Straw Hats to the Brick Warehouse and lends them the Rocketman sea train, volunteering to pilot it herself despite its dangerous uncontrollable nature.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the crucial means for the Straw Hats to reach Enies Lobby and save Robin. Shows Kokoro's trust in the crew and her willingness to risk her life.
keyMoments.quote: This is the Rocketman! It's a sea train that was never used because its speed can't be controlled!

reveals.information: Capable of piloting the dangerous, uncontrollable Rocketman sea train

keyMoments.title: Preparing the Rocketman
keyMoments.description: Despite his severe injuries from CP9's attack, Iceburg services the Rocketman and fills it with enough coal for the entire journey to Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Iceburg's support for the rescue mission and his dedication despite his own condition.

keyMoments.title: Finding Usopp and Franky
keyMoments.description: Sanji battles through the Puffing Tom and discovers Usopp and Franky imprisoned in Cart Six, marking progress in his solo rescue mission.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's combat prowess and determination to rescue Robin by locating other captives.

keyMoments.title: Meeting Franky
keyMoments.description: Sanji meets Franky for the first time. In comedic fashion, Sanji kicks Franky before Usopp clarifies the situation.
keyMoments.significance: First direct interaction between Sanji and Franky, establishing their dynamic before Franky eventually joins the crew.

relationships.description: Sanji meets Franky for the first time while both are working to save Robin.

evolutionMoments.description: First meeting between Sanji and Franky on the Puffing Tom.

keyMoments.title: Meeting Sanji
keyMoments.description: Franky meets Sanji for the first time while imprisoned in Cart Six of the Puffing Tom. Usopp intervenes to prevent a misunderstanding.
keyMoments.significance: First direct interaction with Sanji, establishing their relationship before Franky joins the crew.

relationships.description: Franky meets Sanji for the first time while both are focused on rescuing Robin.

evolutionMoments.description: First meeting between Franky and Sanji in Cart Six of the Puffing Tom.

keyMoments.title: Stowing Away on the Rocketman
keyMoments.description: Paulie is discovered already aboard the Rocketman, having stowed away to join the rescue mission despite his severe injuries from fighting CP9.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Paulie's loyalty and determination to help save Robin and stop CP9, despite nearly dying in previous battles.
